
#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
void fastscan(int &x)
{
    bool neg=false;
    register int c;
    x =0;
    c = getchar();
    if(c=='-')
    {
        neg = true;
        c = getchar();
    }
    for(;(c>47 && c<58);c=getchar())
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) +c - 48;
    if(neg)
        x *= -1;
}
 
int main()
{
	int testCases;
	fastscan(testCases);
	for(int i=0;i<testCases;i++)
	{
		int n;
		fastscan(n);
		 long long int sum = 1;
		for(int c=2;c * c<=n;c++)
		{
			if(n % c == 0)
			{
				sum += c;
				sum += n/c; 
			}
			if(c * c == n)
				sum -= c;
		}
		printf("%d\n", sum);
	}
          	return 0;
}
